name: Ch15ABaseConvo3
_source: speak;Rennac;Hmm, this desert must be hiding something valuable.|I heard there's ancient treasure buried in these sands...
speak;Saleh;Rennac?|What are you doing out here?|Enemy forces have set up an ambush in this area.
speak;Rennac;An ambush?|That's unfortunate timing.|But surely they wouldn't mind if I collected a few trinkets while we deal with them?
speak;Saleh;Are you serious?|We're about to be surrounded by enemies and you're concerned with treasure hunting?
speak;Rennac;My dear Saleh, opportunity waits for no one!|These desert sands have claimed many travelers... and their valuables.|It would be a waste to leave such prizes unclaimed, wouldn't it?
speak;Saleh;I cannot comprehend your priorities at times.|We need to focus on the imminent threat.
speak;Rennac;Yes, yes, the enemy and all that...|Actually, since you're here, I could use your assistance.
speak;Rennac;Your magic!|Walking through this sand is absolutely dreadful on my boots.|Could you perhaps cast something to make traversing this terrain easier?|A small favor between comrades?
speak;Saleh;You want me to use sacred magic...|so you can hunt for treasure more efficiently?|During an enemy ambush?
speak;Rennac;When you put it that way, it sounds quite reasonable!|I knew you'd understand.
speak;Saleh;*sigh*|Fine.|But only because we need to move quickly through this area.
speak;Rennac;Splendid!|I knew I could count on you.
speak;Saleh;...<green>Ancient winds of Caer Pelyn</>, grant this fool swift passage...
speak;Saleh;There. The spell is complete.|Now I must prepare our forces for the ambush.|Try not to get yourself killed while digging for trinkets.
speak;Rennac;Such concern! I'm touched!|Now, where was that glimmer I spotted earlier...

speak;Rennac;With this spell, I'll find twice the treasure in half the time!|My merchant will be impressed when I return with ancient relics!|...Though perhaps I'll neglect to mention how I acquired them.
